problem_info: Optimize a protein powder supply chain with multiple suppliers, bonded warehouses, manufacturers, warehouses, and distributors to minimize transportation cost.
input_format: Number of suppliers, number of bonded warehouses, number of manufacturers, number of warehouses, number of distributors, number of warehouse locations, number of distributor locations, distance between supplier and bonded warehouse, distance between manufacturer and warehouse, distance between warehouse and distributor, distance between bonded warehouse and warehouse, distance between bonded warehouse and manufacturer, transportation cost per kilometer, unit cost.
output_info: Optimal flow of goods through the network, minimizing the total transportation cost.
output_format: Quantity of goods transported between each pair of facilities, flow variables (binary) indicating whether goods are transported.

parameters.definition: Distance between Supplier i and Bonded Warehouse j
Distance between Manufacturer and Warehouse j
Distance between Warehouse j and Distributor k
Distance between Bonded Warehouse i and Warehouse j
Distance between Bonded Warehouse i and Manufacturer

variables.definition: Flow of goods from Supplier i to Bonded Warehouse j
Flow of goods from Bonded Warehouse i to Manufacturer
Flow of goods from Bonded Warehouse i to Warehouse j
Flow of goods from Manufacturer to Warehouse j
Flow of goods from Warehouse j to Distributor k
Binary variable indicating whether goods are transported from Supplier i to Bonded Warehouse j
Binary variable indicating whether goods are transported from Bonded Warehouse i to Manufacturer
Binary variable indicating whether goods are transported from Bonded Warehouse i to Warehouse j
Binary variable indicating whether goods are transported from Manufacturer to Warehouse j
Binary variable indicating whether goods are transported from Warehouse j to Distributor k
